name: Momo - The Forest Horror Game
description:
Momo:The Forest Horror Game - is base on scary message from user "Momo"! Next Chapter of story transferes player to momo forest! Collect all letters of momo & get rid of scary ghost!Never look on it- escape her message!

Momo:The Forest Horror Game Features:
- Dark night forest horror game atmosphere
- Loud & scary screamer following every where
- Dark Forest to explore with buildings to find letters of ghost message
- Scary game music loops

If you like horror - don't miss chapter of game series.

Video by : 

Luigikid Gaming
